message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $12,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11,000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price for such a great product.
